file_content.text: With the fugitives gone, a stain on the Empire has been removed.
It's finished; the fugitives are dead.
I sensed their deaths. Indeed, you are not as they were.
Yes. I sensed each death as you struck them down. A fitting end to my search.
I obtained some minor trinkets during my search for the fugitives. Take whatever you wish--every hunt must have its trophies.
Go. The fugitives' annihilation is long overdue.
Have you ever truly admired the redness of blood on snow? Listened to how screams echo in freezing air?
Hoth is a hunter's world. And the Republic isn't our only quarry here.
I'd be disappointed if the Republic was the best challenge we could find.
Pleased to hear it.
Blood on snow, echoing screams... please, continue.
I like how you think.
If you like big-game hunting, you're spoiled for choice.
There's plenty of wildlife.
My prey are less than beasts.
Tracking a target and taking it out does have a certain satisfaction to it.
There's a thrill to the chase.
You came to Hoth for a reason, then.
You're looking for someone?
Try being specific.
Bold. Unwise, but bold.
I pursue a group of Force-sensitive aliens. Gutter trash, who killed the Sith sent to purge them, claimed Sith weapons, and fled.
For years, they've eluded me, trained and grown stronger. But our Chiss allies have earned my favor; they found the fugitives' base here. All that remains is choosing an executioner.
These scum should face the displeasure of a real Sith.
Allow me.
I rose above my origins and proved myself--if I hadn't, I might have been among these fugitives.
This could have been my fate.
I can see what you are. But if you are also Sith, you understand why they must die.
Go to the base. See what you could have become... and destroy them all.
Perhaps I can teach these fugitives some manners.
It'd be my pleasure.
I can do quick and quiet, or slow and painful. Depending on your credits.
Hire me and I'll handle it.
You will be compensated.
We can't have them interfering with Imperial operations.
They're a threat. I'll do it.
I thought you'd want to give this your personal attention.
Don't you want to kill them?
They know my presence. I wish them to have no warning.
Go to the base. Leave no survivors. Show these scum the wrath of the Empire.
No thanks. [Refuse quest]
How very disappointing.
Hoth's stillness reminds me of a sleeping predator.
